Package Controllers

Class ShowManager

java.lang.Object
Controllers.ShowManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Manager
public class ShowManager extends Object implements Manager
Show manager can create, read, update, and delete Shows

  • Method Details

    • isOverlapping

      public static boolean isOverlapping(LocalTime start1, LocalTime end1, LocalTime start2, LocalTime end2)
      Helper function to check if the start and end times of the show being created, conflicts with an existing show for the same cineplex, theatre, and date.
      Parameters:
      start1 - Start time for the new show as requested by user
      end1 - End time for the new show as requested by user
      start2 - Start time for the existing show in database
      end2 - End time for the existing show in database
      Returns:
      true if there is a conflict, else return false

    • createShow

      public static void createShow(Scanner sc)
      Create method Create new show and add it to the database
      Parameters:
      sc - Takes in scanner to instantiate various fields in the function

    • printShowList

      public static void printShowList()
      Read method. Print method to display everything on the txt file database

    • findShow

      public static Show findShow(int showID)
      Read method. Find show by show ID.
      Parameters:
      showID - show ID of show to be found.
      Returns:
      Object of type Show

    • updateShows

      public static void updateShows(int showId, Scanner sc)
      Update method this updates the various field of movieGoer by showId
      Parameters:
      showId - show ID of show to be updated
      sc - Takes in scanner to update various fields within the function

    • deleteShow

      public static void deleteShow(int showID)
      Delete method. Delete show based on showID
      Parameters:
      showID - show ID of show to be deleted

    • getShows

      Get shows from file
      Parameters:
      fileName - file to be read
      Returns:
